duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform pre/post trip inspection on delivery vehicle
Load vehicle and match products to customer paperwork for accuracy
Transport and deliver products from store to customer locations
Complete delivery paperwork promptly and accurately
Greet and assess customer needs, offer solutions, and upsell additional products
Mix, tint, and match paint to customer requests
Ensure store is clean and stocked with products
Use POS system to receive payments and cash out customers
Maintain high service standards and resolve customer issues

education_certification.credential: Must be at least 18 years of age and have a valid driver license with no restrictions and an acceptable driving record
